price: 111. Ya sólo, lelo nazali kofuta bango тропа oyo bazalaki na bozeli na yango. Ya sólo, bango nde balongi.
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
